markdownRemark.html:
In discussions about accessibility and diversity, our thoughts tend to jump to ARIA links, screen readers, and people of different ethnicities. While these are key aspects to both topics, this talk will push your thinking to considerations beyond accessibility and diversity basics.

Recorded: October 15, 2020 (12pm ET)
Speakers:
Tearyne Almendariz (Twitter - @TearyneG)
Kat Shaw (Twitter - @katannshaw)
Slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/112kJTTyvv4P-AVFW8-3djoA6dwc_LfCv6iaZ9xeWTD0

frontmatter.description: In discussions about accessibility and diversity, our thoughts tend to jump to ARIA links, screen readers, and people of different ethnicities. While these are key aspects to both topics, this talk will push your thinking to considerations beyond accessibility and diversity basics.
frontmatter.title: Leveraging Accessibility and Usability to Serve Truly Diverse Audiences
frontmatter.subtitle: Tearyne Almendariz and Kat Shaw
